summary:
This mod adds 3 new arrows with their own new textures to Skyrim.
These Arrows are MAGIC !!!!!!!
descriptionHtml:
This is my second Skyrim Mod
[u][size=3]
Description[/size][/u]
This Mod adds three new unique arrows to skyrim.
-The ligntning Arrow
-The fire Arrow
-The ice Arrow
These Arrows aren´t only stronger than normal Arrows (not game breaking) but they will also turn back  into their natural form in middair.
[u][size=3]Installation[/size][/u]
[u]NMM: [/u]Install as you would install any other mod.
[u]Manual: [/u]Drop magicarrows.esp into your Data folder.
Drop the Textures-Folder into the Skyrim Data folder.
You can find the arrows in Boss chests or in a Barell at the Gate of Whiterun.
[size=3]This mod should not have any compabilitie problems with other mods [/size].[size=3]PM me if this is not the case.

[u][b][size=4]Enjoy !!!![/size][/b][/u][/size]
author: zitterpappel14
